Articles.Content:
What are your plans/pranks for April Fools' Day?

What have you already pulled? How did it go?

What's been tried on you? How did you react?
April 1st was my dog's birthday. My first and best pet. RIP old girl.
wake up at 8:30 and got to work at 9:00. yeah...boring day...

Here in Arizona, it is currently the past.

April 1st isn't for another 6 hours or so.
Oh hell, is it Hide From the Internet Day again?

> 
> Oh hell, is it Hide From the Internet Day again?

Looks like it.

1: Fill a glass with water.

2: Hold a plastic sandwich bag tightly around the top.

3: Quickly flip glass over onto flat surface of choice.

4: Pull sandwich bag out from underneath.

5: Walk away. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T01:28:26Z" title="04/01/2015 01:28  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by segaprophet**
Believe nothing from anyone. Everything is a lie!

> 
> Believe nothing from anyone. Everything is a lie!

Stop lying!

> 
> Oh hell, is it Hide From the Internet Day again?

Quick! To the emergency bunker! Before it's tooÃ¢â‚¬â€œ \*gets hit by a terrible April Fools prank\*
Have you seen modern media? Every day is April Fools Day.

For god's sake, guys. *Am I the only one who* ***actually enjoys April Fools' Day!?***

***INCREASINGLY EMPHASIZED FONT*** ***COMPELS YOU***

> 
> For god's sake, guys. *Am I the only one who* ***actually enjoys April Fools' Day!?***
> ***INCREASINGLY EMPHASIZED FONT*** ***COMPELS YOU***

***I don't believe! I swear!***

> 
> For god's sake, guys. *Am I the only one who* ***actually enjoys April Fools' Day!?***

***Yes, you are.***

> 
> Stop lying!

Stop breaking meeeeeeh! D:
Set off the smoke alarm while my roomies are sleeping, leave for work...![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Guys, I thought it was a joke one person was pulling

Then it was two, then three, then four!

My god, now everyone making their avatars something straight out of MS Paint and using comic sans! What kind of sick, sick, joke is this?!

I hate you April Fools' Day!
My best friend was born on April 1st no joke

I'm fooling a bully of mine.

BTW if you look at Red Iron Crown's avatar it has a green splotch...

...

grEeN iROn cRoWN wIlL rISe aGaiN

> 
> What are your plans/pranks for April Fools' Day?
> What have you already pulled? How did it go?
> 
> What's been tried on you? How did you react?

I've just joined in on othr ppl's joke. I hope they dont mind. today ist still 3/31, but tomoorow it wil be time

Greg, also?! What is this world coming too?! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T02:21:40Z" title="04/01/2015 02:21  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by Thomas988**
  
Redudancy

I already planned my joke since a few days. I will tell my parent that I've been arrested during a manifestation( I didn't meant to be there, the cops just thought I was manifesting) and that I need someone to confirm my identity.

>:-)

All I have to say is:

![giphy.gif](http://media.giphy.com/media/VGuAZNdkPUpEY/giphy.gif)

> I've just joined in on othr ppl's joke. I hope they dont mind. today ist still 3/31, but tomoorow it wil be time

I decided to join too, I hope they don't mind also.
